Monitor.​ViewApp.​ViewModel.​ProbabilityTableViewModel
ViewModelBase
public
Monitor.​ViewApp.​ViewModel.​ProbabilityTableViewModel

ProbabilityTableViewModel class stores the logic & data of the ProbabilityTableView.  The main goal of the ProbabilityTableViewModel is to link between the data which related to the selected component's dependencies to the UI components.  This class inherits from Galasoft.MvvmLight.ViewModelBase which is the base class for any ViewModel in MVVM pattern.
